menu_heisters_never_die_desc:
BASIC: ##$basic##
When you revive someone using inspire, you will revive everyone around him in a ##50## meters radius 

ACE: ##$pro##
Increases the bonus to ##100## meters
menu_dodge_speed_boost_desc:
BASIC: ##$basic##
Everytime you dodge you get ##40%## movement speed for ##1## second and restore ##10%## stamina

ACE: ##$pro##
Increase the  movement speed bonus to ##60%##
